4th of July Celebration
The Annual July 4th Celebration
at Commons Park will take place
Friday July, 4th from 3 PM
- 10 PM
11600 Poinciana Blvd. Royal Palm Beach, FL 33411
Rate your favorite event at Commons Park
Updated 2025 Poster
Enjoy a day of fun at Commons Park with the Village of Royal Palm Beach  and our Star Spangled Celebration!
​The festivities begin at 3pm and run to 10pm and will feature some exciting activities which include a Free Kids' Fun Zone, Arts & Craft and merchandise vendors, and a nice selection of food vendors that will surely satisfy your appetite.
​
At 9pm look to westside of the Great Lawn for some
amazing fireworks.
Food trucks and food vendors will be onsite in addition to all of the great shopping opportunities from
merchandise vendors, exhibitors and local artists
selling their hand-crafted wares.
Beat the Traffic...  Arrive Early & Stay Late!
Vendor Booths will be set up on the grass of the Great Lawn of Royal Palm Beach Commons
Directions
​Royal Palm Beach Commons is located along Royal Palm Beach Blvd. approximately ¾ of a mile south of Southern Blvd. (State Road 80) at 11600 Poinciana Blvd.Royal Palm Beach, FL 33411
More than 20,000 attendees in 2024
Admission is FREE!
Parking is available throughout the park.
Avoid traffic delays arrive early & stay late.
Bring lawn chairs and a blanket.
Interested in Vending at this event
Call or Email Kathy Gilbert at
​POTTC Events for details
561 792-9260
[email protected]
​
2025 Exhibitor Space is Available
Vendor Info
Vendor Fees
Arts & Craft: $135
Commercial/Retail: $175
Corporate: $300*
Non-Profit: $135
Food & Beverage: starting at $300
​Application Fee: $10
2025 Vendor Application
To apply, complete and submit the following form(s)
Vendor Application
Food & Beverage Vendors must also complete the following Supplemental Form.
Food Vendor Supplemental
Power/Lighting:
Power is
NOT
available for purchase. The Great Lawn is fully illuminated but the lighting is not sufficient to light up the inside of your booth.
If you need power, you may elect to bring and use your own quiet inverter generator.
Personal
Fireworks,
Grills, and Glass Bottles
are prohibited

Halfway to Christmas Craft Fair
Halfway to Christmas Craft Fair
West Expo Center at the South Florida Fairgrounds
9067 Southern Blvd. West Palm Beach, FL 33411
​
June 14th & 15th 2025
We welcome you to the Annual Halfway to Christmas Craft Fair
An Exciting Two-Day Christmas Themed Arts & Crafts Fair packed with amazing vendors and unique
exhibitors.
An Indoor Holiday Shopping Extravaganza
Admission $7.00
Children 10 & Under admitted Free.
One Paid Admission is good for reentry both days with hand stamp
​
Hours: Saturday & Sunday 10AM to 4PM
​Enjoy the Sights and Sounds of the Holidays with Decorations, Inflatable Displays, and Hourly Door Prizes. Watch for Occasional Artificial Snow Flurries!
Bring a Jacket! It can get cold inside.
Watch for Occasional Artificial
 Snow Flurries! Bring a jacket, it can get cold inside.
Looking for something cool to do this summer?
Get a jump on your holiday shopping and enjoy the sights and sounds of the Holidays with lights, music and all of the cool inflatable displays and Christmas decorations. Shop in air-conditioned comfort while supporting local arts and craft vendors and small businesses.
​
​   At the Halfway to Christmas Craft Fair, you’ll find vendors from all over the state and beyond with a large variety of products to choose from including fine art, jewelry, handcrafted items, clothing, baked goods, chocolates, unique gifts, soap, candles, Christmas décor, and so much more.
There will also be Food and Beverage available for purchase.
Saturday & Sunday: From 12 Noon to 2PM
Get your camera ready as Santa and Mrs. Claus will be stopping in to say hello!
Vendor Application and Information

Royal Palm Beach
​Rock-N Fall Fest
Come Join us at Commons Park for the Annual Royal Palm Beach Rock-N Fall Fest.
​
OCTOBER 3rd & 4th 2025
​Friday 5PM to 10PM & Saturday 1PM to 9PM
A
two-day community festival that kicks off the fall season with family fun, a variety of craft vendors, cold beer, merchandise and a nice selection of savory foods.
Enjoy live music
,
tribute bands,
and many other fun activities.
Children, Families and Pets, get in the Halloween spirit by entering one of the costume contests.
​
Costume Contest
Pumpkin Carving Contest
Bring lawn chairs or a blanket for a full day of fun.
Traffic delays are expected so come early.
​Parking is available throughout the park with additional Off-Site parking available at Village Hall.
Rate your favorite event at Commons Park

Royal Palm Beach
​Winter Fest
WINTER FEST
Royal Palm Beach Winter Fest - December 6th, 2025
Be a part of the Village of Royal Palm Beach’s annual Winter Festival on Saturday, December 6th, from 2:00 PM - 9:00 PM as we countdown to the illumination of the Christmas Tree at Commons Park.
​
Get in the holiday spirit and enjoy the sounds from local school choirs, bands, and dance teams that will be sure to get you in the holiday spirit.
A variety of holiday crafts and decorations will be abundant throughout the park and available for purchase from our many local vendors. The park will have great food as well as games & rides throughout the park in addition to the Free Kid’s Fun Zone.
Remember, Santa will be stopping by for a visit, so don’t forget your camera!
Parking will be available throughout the park. Avoid traffic and come early. Expect traffic delays. Bring lawn chairs and a blanket for a day of fun for all ages. Off-Site parking available at Village Hall.
Rate your favorite event at Commons Park

Specializing in Themed Events
About
Providing Event Coordination and Management to Festivals & Events
Vendor Coordination & Consultation, On-site Logistics
Click Here For Upcoming Festivals & Events
​Themed Festivals & Craft Fairs with Quality Exhibitors
​POTTC Events offers more than 30 years of combined experience in creating themed events designed to bring people together in a fun and festive, family-friendly atmosphere.
Bored with ordinary Craft Fairs or Food Truck Gatherings?
Our Festivals and Craft Fairs have strong themes, both indoors and out, and plenty of quality vendors and exhibitors to shop and explore.

February 28th, March 1st & 2nd 2025
Royal Palm Beach Commons Park    11600 Poinciana Blvd. Royal Palm Beach
RPB West Fest
Friday - 5 PM to 10:00 PM
Saturday - 3 PM to 9 PM
Sunday - 1 PM to 5 PM
Dust off your boots and kick up your heels!
West Fest is coming your way!
Rate your favorite event at Commons Park
Grab yer partner head on over to Commons Park for a rootin’-tootin’ 3-day Weekend!
Here’s what’s fixin’ to happen: L
ive music, exciting shows, and good ol’ fashioned fun! Don’t forget—it’s all FREE!
Friday, Feb 28 | 5 PM - 10 PM
-  Fun Zone
-  Southern Blood: 6:30 PM
-  Only in America Brooks & Dunn Tribute: 8:30 PM
Saturday, March 1 | 3 PM - 9 PM
-  Fun Zone
-  Arts and Crafts: 3 PM - 6 PM
-  Kiannely: 3:00 PM
-  Lumberjack Show: 3 PM & 5 PM
-  Line Dancing: 4 PM - 5 PM
-  Mayor & Council Welcome: 5:30 PM
-  Whiskey Six Band: 6 PM
-  Garth Brooks Tribute: 8 PM
Sunday, March 2 | 1 PM - 5 PM
-  Fun Zone
-  Mitch Herrick & The Home Grown Sinners: 2 PM
-  Toby Keith Tribute: 4 PM
-  Lumberjack Show: 2 PM & 4 PM

at South Florida Fairgrounds

Expo Center
November 15th & 16th 2025

:
Saturday &
Sunday 10 am - 4 pm

Shop till you drop at this festive 2-day indoor holiday shopping adventure!
With Thousands of Items to choose from, make the Holiday Shopping Fair at the South Florida Fairgrounds Expo Center your destination to Wrap Up your Holiday Shopping this November.
Fun for the Whole Family!
Enjoy the sights and sounds of the Holidays with Decorations, Inflatable Displays, Hourly Door Prizes and Daily Visits from Santa Claus.
